name: TheShockingTruth
0:
”Alexa, open The Shocking Truth”
”Alexa, start The Shocking Truth”
”Alexa, ask The Shocking Truth for a burn”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the shocking truth
des: Yer da more then likely sells a form of cleaning product meant for human skin that is more then likely a scam and/or a waste of his time. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next burn. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
